players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly. We should be cautious and try to figure out who could have done this."
Diana: "I think we should all keep an eye on each other tonight. With Charlie's sudden demise, it's important that we work together to ensure everyone's safety."
Bob: "Let's not jump to conclusions about who killed Charlie. We should focus on gathering more information and working together to uncover the truth."
